alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 9:54AM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Far Northern and North Woods Maine. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 15 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and the wind will combine to create low wind chills. Frostbite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken. Make sure you wear a hat and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
